description: Create 1 - 4 web servers running IIS on Server 2012 R2 datacentre or Server 2016 datacentre.  Configures vNet, with Frontend and Backend NGSs with appropriate rules.
summary: This template creates one to four Window Server 2012R2 or Windows Server 2016 VM(s) with IIS configured using DSC and one SQL Server 2014 standard edition VM.
